raw_text: ATTUKORALE – UDUMULLAGE – PODINONA (Baptismal and preferred name : Shanti Bernadette Podinona Attukorale) – Beloved aunt of Kusum Athukorala,​ Gunadasa,​ Kumarihami,​ Malini,​ the late Wijesiri and great aunt to Chandrika and Janith,​ much loved friend of the late Yvonne and Thomas CanagaRetna and second mother to their children,​ including the late Wilfred Tilak and the late Christopher Rajit and adored by their surviving children Sevanti,​ Priyanti and Amitti and grandchildren Benedict,​ Anoushka,​ Jessica,​ Joey and Bethan – passed away peacefully,​ aged 97,​ on 10th October 2023 in St. James’ Hospital,​ Leeds,​ West Yorkshire,​ England. Funeral will take place at Christ the King,​ Battyeford. Date to be confirmed.067980

DIAS – DEVIKA (nee ABAYASEKARA) – Beloved wife of Chryshantha (Nestle PLC),​ loving daughter of late Roy and Pearl Abayasekara,​ darling sister of late Mohan,​ Suraj and Chandrika,​ darling aunty of Anya and Jonathan,​ Dilshara and Shannan,​ passed away peacefully on the 22nd of October 2023. Funeral Service will take place at 3.00 p.m. on Wednesday,​ 25th October at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour,​ followed by Burial at 4.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Roman Catholic Section).068283

DIAS – Mrs SUMANA (94 years of Meritorious life). beloved wife of late Cyril Dias,​ loving sister of late J.A.J. (Jimson) Perera,​ late Nanda Pieris,​ late Chandra Liyanage,​ J.A.W. Perera (Ivan),​ Rev. Dehiwala Mahinda,​ expired on 24th October 2023. The remains will lie at No. 10,​ Pieris Place,​ Quarry Road,​ Dehiwala. Cortege leaves at 4.15 p.m. for Cremation at 5.00 p.m. on 25th October at “Nisala Arana Cemetery”,​ Kohuwala.068362

JAYASINGHE TISSA NIHAL,​ Tissa was a devoted husband to Charmaine,​ loving father of Shaumya,​ father-in-law of David and grandfather to Hannelore,​ Nathaniel and Grace,​ brother of Daya,​ Asoka and Senaka,​ passed away at home peacefully on 22nd October 2023. Body will be brought home on Wednesday 25th October at 8.30 a.m. Cortege leaves residence at 1.45 p.m. on the 25th to Kohuwala Public Cemetery for Cremation at 2 p.m. No flowers by request. 11,​ Mudliyar Avenue,​ Kohuwala.068109
